## URITemplate.expand() method

Expands a [URITemplate](./format.uritemplate.md) with provided values

**Signature:**

```typescript
static expand(template: URITemplate | string, values: Record<string, Variable>): string;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

template


</td><td>

[URITemplate](./format.uritemplate.md) \| string


</td><td>

[URITemplate](./format.uritemplate.md) object or string


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

values


</td><td>

Record&lt;string, [Variable](./format.variable.md)<!-- -->&gt;


</td><td>

Values to substitute into the template


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

string

## Example


```ts
URITemplate.expand("/users/\{id\}", \{ id: "123" \})
// => "/users/123"

URITemplate.expand("/search\{?q,page\}", \{ q: "test", page: "1" \})
// => "/search?q=test&page=1"
```
